attributes.action: Make it law for all glass bottled drinks in the UK to be recycled (washed out)
attributes.additional_details: Barbados is a leading example, with their own Banks beer being recycled and reused across the island. This is an achieveable goal for our country and just one thing we can do to help the uprising issue of climate change, becoming more and more apparent to us in the past few weeks.
attributes.background: Drinks such as Pesi or Coca Cola are the most popular drinks in our nation, with an estimated 1.9 billon consumed daily. Think about the masses of waste produced from that amount. Don’t you think we should be doing something to reduce that ton of waste?
